if I had so sour a disposition, there might be
for me

to put off starving himself to death until
had returned from the festival of Ceres, for
he alledging that it was would spoil her holiday
if he refused to comply, as it was not permitted
to appear in the procession immediately after the
death of a relation; & how good temperedly the sage
acceded to her request.- The old man could not
